channel.title: Copa America 2021 by CSR
channel.description: Recent content on Copa America 2021 by CSR

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Argentina v Chile Goals Messi 33' Vargas 57' An even match. Messi got underway with an amazing freekick past Bravo(Just Messi things) The equaliser was classic Argentina which was annoying. Vidal took a penalty which was tipped to the crossbar but Vargas scored on the rebound. Paraguay v Bolivia Goals Saavedra(P) 10' Romero 62' Romero 65' Romero 80' Although Bolivia scored the first goal with a pen and went into half-time in the lead, the red card changed everything and immediately Paraguay attacked hard and scored 3 simple goals making the numerical advantage count.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Brazil v Venezuela Goals Marquinhos 23' Neymar(P) 64' Gabriel Barbosa 89' A very dominant display from the new hosts. Should’ve been atleast 4 or 5 given the types of chances they got. Marquinhos scored the first one from the corner with a brilliant. Neymar then scored a pen and could’ve had a hattrick at the very least. Finally he assisted Gabigol after rounding the keeper. Colombia v Ecuador Goals E.Cardona 42’
